prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that looks like a cute droplet with a playful expression.
I want a Pokemon that can change its form based on the weather, showcasing various colors.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that resembles a small cloud with a blue hue.
Make a Pokemon design that combines elements of water and air, with a round, fluffy body.
Imagine a whimsical Pokemon that can transform into different types based on the environment.
Design a cheerful Pokemon that embodies the essence of rain, with bright blue accents.
Give me a unique Pokemon that has a jelly-like body and can float in midair.
